summary: Now you can even recruit vanilla dragonpriests to your party!
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever wanted recruit vanilla dragonpriests in your party?
Now you can!
[i]Where are they:
[/i]You always can find them inside inn in Morthal!
[i]About them:
[/i]So all vanilla dragon priests are here! Take all of them and defeat your enemies! They use characteristic related spells and special dragonpriest dagger! They are all 50 level and essential (can't be killed) and they all have special weapons (dagger and staff)!
Please share and endorse if you like it ;)
[u]Compabilities/Requirements:
[/u]Works with pretty much everything.
Require:Â 
Konahrik Accoutrements mod (no db dlc needed)

[i]Credits:[/i]
[b]Bethesda for creating Skyrim and TES series
[/b]Edhelsereg for Konahrik accoutrements mod
